name: Torvin Stonebeard

racial_traits.name: Darkvision
racial_traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

racial_traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
racial_traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

racial_traits.name: Dwarven Combat Training
racial_traits.description: You have proficiency with battleaxes, handaxes, light hammers, and warhammers.

racial_traits.name: Stonecunning
racial_traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

racial_traits.name: Armor Proficiency
racial_traits.description: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

class_features.name: Spellcasting
class_features.description: As a conduit for divine power, you can cast cleric spells.

class_features.name: Divine Domain: Life
class_features.description: Your domain grants you domain spells and other features.

class_features.name: Bonus Proficiency
class_features.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor.

class_features.name: Disciple of Life
class_features.description: Whenever you use a spell of 1st level or higher to restore hit points to a creature, the creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

class_features.name: Channel Divinity
class_features.description: You can channel divine energy to fuel magical effects. You start with two such effects: Turn Undead and an effect determined by your domain.

class_features.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
class_features.description: You can use your Channel Divinity to heal the badly injured. You can restore a number of hit points equal to five times your cleric level.

starting_equipment.name: Explorer's Pack
starting_equipment.description: Includes backpack, bedroll, mess kit, tinderbox, 10 torches, 10 days of rations, waterskin, 50 feet of hempen rope.

starting_equipment.name: Holy Symbol (Amulet)
starting_equipment.description: A symbol of your faith, worn visibly.

personality_traits: I idolize a particular hero of my faith, and constantly refer to that person's deeds and example.
I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working toward peace.
ideals: Tradition. The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld.
bonds: I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
flaws: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.
